rukus.text: 44|1|ha  mi m
44|2|a l laoh sbath nung kompir( kuor an) del chbasaleasa .

44|3|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban banhchouh vea nowknong reatrei da utdongk utdam( yb muoy nei khe r mea d n delke aoyochhmoh tha  lai la tol k  teur) .  pitabrakd nasa  yeung kuchea anak del dasatuen promean ( dl mnoussa lok) .
44|4|nowknong yb noh trauv ke bengchek nouv real batobanhchea del  brakabdaoy ktebandet
44|5|kuchea batobanhchea del chenhpi yeung .  pitabrakd nasa yeung  kuchea anak banhchoun banda anakneasar( towkean mnoussa lok)
44|6|del chea kdei me tda krounea pi mcheasa robsa anak( mou ham meat) . pit  brakd nasa  trong mha lyy  mha doeng .
44|7|trong chea mcheasa nei mekh cheachraen chean  ning phendei  haey ning avei   del mean now rveang vea teangpir  brasenbae puok anakchea anak chuecheak noh .

44|8|kmean mcheasa na del trauv ke korp sakkar da pitabrakd krawpi  trong laey .  trong thveu aoy rsa  ning thveu aoy slab .  trong chea mcheasa robsa puok anak  ning chea mcheasa robsa chidaunchitea chomnean moun robsa puok anak .
44|9|phtoytowvinh  puokke( puok mou sh ri ki n) sthet knong pheap sangsay teang  lengsaech .
44|10|dau che  neah  chaur anak( mou ham meat) rngcham thngai muoy del mekh nung noam  mk nouv phsaeng yeang chbasa .
44|11|vea nung krobadandab leu mnoussa lok .  nih kuchea tearounakamm  da chhucheab .
44|12|( puokke niyeay tha)  ao mcheasa robsa puok yeung.  saum trong  me tda banhchiesa tondakamm nih pi puok yeung phng  puok yeung pitchea anak  del mean chomnue .
44|13|tae puokke ach phnheak rluk ban yeang dauch me  d ch(nowpel  tondakamm ban thleak leu puokke)  khn del anakneasar da chbasaleasa  ban mokadl puokke haey noh
44|14|banteabmk puokke ban ber chenhpi ke( anakneasar) haey  ban niyeay tha  ke chea mnoussa del trauv ke pongvok  chea mnoussaavikl- chrit towvinh .
44|15|pitabrakd nasa  yeung chea anak dk tondakamm chenh muoy  ry khlei .  pitabrakd nasa  puok anak nung tralbtow theato daem vinh
44|16|now thngai del yeung dak tearounakamm yeang khlangokla(towleu  puok brachheang) .  pitabrakd nasa  yeung chea anak dak tearounakamm .
44|17|haey chea karpit nasa  yeung ban sakalbong krom robsa  hvie r aon moun puokke( puok mou sh ri ki n)towtiet  daoy anakneasar  mneak da thlaithnaur( mou sa) ban mokkan puokke .

44|18|( mou sa ban pol tha)  chaur puok anak brakl  banda khnhom robsa  a l laoh( ambaur aisreael) mk aoy khnhom vinh phng .  pitabrakd nasa  khnhom chea anakneasar mneak del chea ti touk chetd bamphot samreab puok anak .
44|19|haey chaur puok anak kom kraeutakratm champoh a l laoh aoy  saoh .  pitabrakd nasa  khnhom chea anak del noam phosdo tang yeang cheak  chbasa mk aoy puok anak .
44|20|haey pitabrakd nasa  khnhom som pi mcheasa robsakhnhom  ning chea mcheasa  robsa puok anak aoy karpar khnhom komaoy puok anak kb khnhom nung dom thm .
44|21|haey brasenbae puok anak min chue khnhom te noh  saum puok anak touk  aoy khnhom now mneakeng choh .
44|22|pelnoh  keat( mou sa) ban pol towkean mcheasa robsa  keat tha  pitabrakd nasa  puok teangnoh kuchea krom del br pru td  babakamm .

44|23|( a l laoh mean bantoul tb vinh tha)  dau che  neah chaur anak( mou sa)  noam khnhom teanglay robsa yeung( anak mean chomnue) chakchenh nowpel yb  choh .  puok anak pitchea nung trauv ke denh tam .
44|24|haey chaur anak( mou sa) touk aoy tukasamoutr noh mean chanloh  dauchnih choh .  pitabrakd nasa  puokke kuchea krom teahean del trauv ke  ponlich( nowknong samoutr) .
44|25|cheachraen mk haey del puokke ban bansaoltouk nouv suonochbar  ning braphp tuk .
44|26|ning chamkar  haeyning phoumikruah da braneit  .
44|27|promteang sechakdeisokh del puokke thleab ttuol ban nowknong  lokey nih .
44|28|dauchnaoh der  yeung ban bansaol vea toukchea morotk dl krom dtei  tiet .
44|29|haey mekh ning phendei minban yom sranaoh champoh puokke laey  haey puokke ka min trauv ban ke ponyearpel( daktondakamm)  der .
